Texts.Eng: Detailed military doctrine of the fallen Mantizi empire.

Texts.Chs: 第82页：没有什么比盾构墙更重要的了，需要反复钻孔，直到机组完全同步。他们必须齐心协力，团结一致。 每次使用圣光之矛的刺入都应该是通过开口完成的，不要放弃守卫。如果城墙摇摇欲坠，整个队形就会失败。这将意味着你的单位的结束。训练你的部队，直到他们因此而憎恨你，然后再训练更多。
Texts.Eng: Page 82: There are few things as important as the shield wall, and repeated drills are required until such time as the unit is perfectly synced. They must move as one, turn as one. Each thrust with the Light Spear should be done through the opening, never dropping the guard. Should the wall falter, the entire formation will fail. This will spell the end of your unit. Drill your forces until they hate you for it, and then drill some more.

Texts.Chs: 第87页: 光明之矛是不可或缺的，因为没有它，我们不得不依靠火器或肉搏战，而不是两者兼而有之。 我们的祖先发明了等离子形式的甲虫族长矛，使之成为完美的通用武器，而我们却忘记了他们的发明中牺牲了什么，这让他们感到羞耻。十代战争证明，我们的力量对敌人来说几乎是无懈可击的。 这个理论是有效的。 要么坚持下去，要么死在敌人手里。
Texts.Eng: Page 87: The Light Spear is integral, for without it we are forced to rely on either firearm or melee combat, rather than both. Our ancestors developed the plasmic-formed zerchesium spears to be perfect all-purpose weapons, and we shame them by forgetting what was sacrificed in their invention. The Ten-Generation War proved that our might was virtually unassailable to the enemy. The doctrine works. Adhere to it, or perish to the Great Enemy.

Texts.Chs: 沃格斯 · 西格纳信条
